## About Me

I am a final-year PhD candidate at UCL's Social Research Institute. My research focuses on evaluating social policies using advanced quantitative methods, administrative data, and mixed methods approaches to improve outcomes for children and young people.

My work has contributed to current UK parliamentary legislation, including evidence supporting the Children's School and Wellbeing Bill and Working Together 2025.

## Research Interests

- Policy evaluation and causal inference
- Child welfare and safeguarding
- Administrative data linkage (ECHILD)
- Quasi-experimental methods
